page.title: 15TUNLEY RECREATION
page.content: Tunley Recreation Centre, built in 1960, is a detached single storey building situated near the centre of the village, next to the football pitch. The centre is the venue for many village activities fund raising dances discos, weekly bingo sessions for the football club and private functions such as wedding receptions. A play group meets daily for the pre-school age children. The local village ladies frequently hold coffee mornings at the centre. The centre is also used by local pop groups and bands who practise there. Interested villagers attend weekly art and craft courses there. The centre's organising committee meet monthly to discuss fund raising activities and to produce the centre's newsletter.
